title: Syncope (fainting)
body:
You were assessed today for a fainting episode (syncope).

{{#if precipitating_factors}}Possible triggers identified:
{{precipitating_factors}}

{{/if}}Safety advice:
- Rise slowly from sitting/lying positions.
- Maintain hydration and regular meals.

Driving advice: {{driving_advice}}.

Return to ED urgently if you develop:
- Chest pain, palpitations, or shortness of breath
- Persistent dizziness or repeated fainting
- New neurological symptoms (weakness, speech problems)

Follow-up: {{followup_timeframe}}.
disclaimer: This letter is general advice and does not replace follow-up with your usual clinician.
